NAME: AEC
PURPOSE: AEC cookies ensure that requests within a browsing session are made by the user, and not by other sites. These cookies prevent malicious sites from acting on behalf of a user without that user’s knowledge.

NAME: _gid
PURPOSE: ID used to identify users for 24 hours after last activity

NAME: DV
PURPOSE: This cookies is used to collect website statistics and track conversion rates and Google ad personalisation

NAME: _gid
PURPOSE: ID used to identify users for 24 hours after last activity

NAME: __Host-GAPS
PURPOSE: Used to sign in with Google account.

NAME: NID
PURPOSE: This cookies is used to collect website statistics and track conversion rates and Google ad personalisation

NAME: muc_ads
PURPOSE: These cookies are placed when you come to our website via X. A cookie from X is also placed on our website, with which we can later show a relevant offer on X

NAME: NID
PURPOSE: This cookies is used to collect website statistics and track conversion rates and Google ad personalisation

NAME: OGPC
PURPOSE: These cookies are used by Google to store user preferences and information while viewing Google mapped pages.

NAME: NID
PURPOSE: This cookies is used to collect website statistics and track conversion rates and Google ad personalisation

NAME: OGP
PURPOSE: This cookie is used by Google to activate and track the Google Maps functionality.

NAME: 1P_JAR
PURPOSE: These cookies are set via embedded youtube-videos. They register anonymous statistical data on for example how many times the video is displayed and what settings are used for playback.
